favourite.article: May the sweet spirit of this song lead our hearts to both love Him and to love His appearing more and more as He draws nearer and nearer! Come quickly our Beloved One!

Brothers and sisters, 'Our Lord, that One of peerless worth came first to die to give new birth; He comes again to have on earth a glorious Bride forever.' I am so glad He is coming again!!!!!!!!!! AMEN.
